```jsx
        <Route path="/tin-tuc" element={<TinTuc />} />

    </BrowserRouter>
  );
}
```

@section Scripts {
    <!-- Animate.css for animations -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/animate.css/4.1.1/animate.min.css" />
    <!-- Intersection Observer for triggering animations on scroll -->
    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const featureItems = document.querySelectorAll('.feature-item');
            
            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                entries.forEach((entry, index) => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            entry.target.style.opacity = '1';
                            entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                        }, index * 100);
                    }
                });
            }, {
                threshold: 0.1
            });

            featureItems.forEach((item, index) => {
                item.style.opacity = '0';
                item.style.transform = 'translateY(30px)';
                item.style.transition = 'all 0.5s ease';
                observer.observe(item);
            });
        });

        function validateForm(event) {
            event.preventDefault();
            
            const form = document.getElementById('registrationForm');
            const formMessage = document.getElementById('formMessage');
            
            // Check if all required fields are filled
            const lastName = document.getElementById('lastName').value.trim();
            const firstName = document.getElementById('firstName').value.trim();
            const email = document.getElementById('email').value.trim();
            const phone = document.getElementById('phone').value.trim();
            const educationType = document.getElementById('educationType').value;
            const infoCheck = document.getElementById('infoCheck').checked;
            const consultCheck = document.getElementById('consultCheck').checked;

            if (!lastName || !firstName || !email || !phone || !educationType || !infoCheck || !consultCheck) {
                formMessage.style.display = 'block';
                formMessage.className = 'alert alert-danger';
                formMessage.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-exclamation-circle"></i> Vui lÃ²ng nháº­p Ä‘áº§y Ä‘á»§ thÃ´ng tin';
                return false;
            }

            // If all validations pass, show success message
            formMessage.style.display = 'block';
            formMessage.className = 'alert alert-success';
            formMessage.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i> ÄÃ£ gá»­i thÃ´ng tin thÃ nh cÃ´ng!';
            
            // Reset form after successful submission
            setTimeout(() => {
                form.reset();
                formMessage.style.display = 'none';
            }, 3000);

            return false;
        }

        function validateAdmissionForm(event) {
            event.preventDefault();
            
            const form = document.getElementById('admissionForm');
            const formMessage = document.getElementById('admissionFormMessage');
            
            // Check if all required fields are filled
            const fullName = document.getElementById('admissionFullName').value.trim();
            const email = document.getElementById('admissionEmail').value.trim();
            const phone = document.getElementById('admissionPhone').value.trim();
            const infoCheck = document.getElementById('admissionInfoCheck').checked;
            const consultCheck = document.getElementById('admissionConsultCheck').checked;

            if (!fullName || !email || !phone || !infoCheck || !consultCheck) {
                formMessage.style.display = 'block';
                formMessage.className = 'alert alert-danger';
                formMessage.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-exclamation-circle"></i> Vui lÃ²ng nháº­p Ä‘áº§y Ä‘á»§ thÃ´ng tin';
                return false;

## 1. Tá»•ng quan giáº£i phÃ¡p

- **Frontend (React)**: Gá»i API Ä‘á»ƒ láº¥y dá»¯ liá»‡u ngÃ nh, Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p, kiá»ƒm tra quyá»n, hiá»ƒn thá»‹ giao diá»‡n phÃ¹ há»£p.

- Táº¡o API `/api/nganh` tráº£ vá» danh sÃ¡ch ngÃ nh tá»« SQL.
- Táº¡o API `/api/login` Ä‘á»ƒ Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p, tráº£ vá» token vÃ  role (user/admin).
- Táº¡o API `/api/user/me` Ä‘á»ƒ láº¥y thÃ´ng tin ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng hiá»‡n táº¡i.

### B. Frontend (React)

- Sá»­ dá»¥ng `fetch` hoáº·c `axios` Ä‘á»ƒ gá»i API láº¥y danh sÃ¡ch ngÃ nh vÃ  hiá»ƒn thá»‹ trong form.
- Khi Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p, lÆ°u token vÃ  role vÃ o localStorage/context.
- Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ giao diá»‡n theo quyá»n (user: Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½, tra cá»©u; admin: quáº£n lÃ½ há»“ sÆ¡, duyá»‡t há»“ sÆ¡...).

## 3. HÆ°á»›ng dáº«n chi tiáº¿t tá»«ng bÆ°á»›c

### BÆ°á»›c 1: Báº¡n Ä‘Ã£ cÃ³ backend/API chÆ°a?
- Náº¿u **chÆ°a cÃ³**, mÃ¬nh sáº½ hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n táº¡o backend Node.js + Express + SQL cÆ¡ báº£n.
- Náº¿u **Ä‘Ã£ cÃ³ API**, báº¡n chá»‰ cáº§n cung cáº¥p endpoint, mÃ¬nh sáº½ hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n gá»i API tá»« React.

### BÆ°á»›c 2: TÃ­ch há»£p láº¥y ngÃ nh há»c vÃ o React
- Sá»­ dá»¥ng `useEffect` Ä‘á»ƒ gá»i API láº¥y danh sÃ¡ch ngÃ nh khi vÃ o form Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½.
- Äá»• dá»¯ liá»‡u vÃ o `<select>` ngÃ nh.

### BÆ°á»›c 3: PhÃ¢n quyá»n tÃ i khoáº£n
- Khi Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p, backend tráº£ vá» role.
- React kiá»ƒm tra role Ä‘á»ƒ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ giao diá»‡n phÃ¹ há»£p.

- Báº¡n Ä‘Ã£ cÃ³ backend/API chÆ°a? Náº¿u cÃ³, cho mÃ¬nh biáº¿t endpoint láº¥y ngÃ nh vÃ  Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p.

## **BÆ¯á»šC 1: Táº O BACKEND NODE.JS + EXPRESS + SQL**

### 1.1. Khá»Ÿi táº¡o backend
```bash
mkdir backend
cd backend
npm init -y
npm install express cors mysql2 jsonwebtoken bcryptjs
```

### 1.2. Táº¡o file `index.js`
```js
const express = require('express');
const cors = require('cors');
const mysql = require('mysql2');
const jwt = require('jsonwebtoken');
const bcrypt = require('bcryptjs');

const app = express();
app.use(cors());
app.use(express.json());

// Káº¿t ná»‘i MySQL
const db = mysql.createConnection({
  host: 'localhost',
  user: 'root',
  password: 'your_password',
  database: 'tuyensinh'
});

// API láº¥y danh sÃ¡ch ngÃ nh
app.get('/api/nganh', (req, res) => {
  db.query('SELECT * FROM nganh', (err, results) => {
    if (err) return res.status(500).json({ error: err });
    res.json(results);
  });
});

// API Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½ tÃ i khoáº£n
app.post('/api/register', async (req, res) => {
  const { username, password, role } = req.body;
  const hash = await bcrypt.hash(password, 10);
  db.query('INSERT INTO users (username, password, role) VALUES (?, ?, ?)', [username, hash, role || 'user'], (err) => {
    if (err) return res.status(500).json({ error: err });
    res.json({ message: 'ÄÄƒng kÃ½ thÃ nh cÃ´ng' });
  });
});

// API Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p
app.post('/api/login', (req, res) => {
  const { username, password } = req.body;
  db.query('SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = ?', [username], async (err, results) => {
    if (err || results.length === 0) return res.status(401).json({ error: 'Sai tÃ i khoáº£n hoáº·c máº­t kháº©u' });
    const user = results[0];
    const match = await bcrypt.compare(password, user.password);
    if (!match) return res.status(401).json({ error: 'Sai tÃ i khoáº£n hoáº·c máº­t kháº©u' });
    const token = jwt.sign({ id: user.id, role: user.role }, 'secret_key', { expiresIn: '1d' });
    res.json({ token, role: user.role });
  });
});

// Middleware xÃ¡c thá»±c token vÃ  phÃ¢n quyá»n
function auth(role = 'user') {
  return (req, res, next) => {
    const token = req.headers.authorization?.split(' ')[1];
    if (!token) return res.status(401).json({ error: 'ChÆ°a Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p' });
    jwt.verify(token, 'secret_key', (err, decoded) => {
      if (err) return res.status(403).json({ error: 'Token khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡' });
      if (role === 'admin' && decoded.role !== 'admin') return res.status(403).json({ error: 'KhÃ´ng Ä‘á»§ quyá»n' });
      req.user = decoded;
      next();
    });
  };
}

// VÃ­ dá»¥ API chá»‰ cho admin
app.get('/api/admin/hoso', auth('admin'), (req, res) => {
  db.query('SELECT * FROM hoso', (err, results) => {
    if (err) return res.status(500).json({ error: err });
    res.json(results);
  });
});

app.listen(5000, () => console.log('Backend cháº¡y á»Ÿ http://localhost:5000'));
```

### 1.3. Táº¡o báº£ng SQL máº«u
```sql
CREATE DATABASE tuyensinh;
USE tuyensinh;

CREATE TABLE nganh (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ten_nganh VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

INSERT INTO nganh (ten_nganh) VALUES ('CÃ´ng nghá»‡ thÃ´ng tin'), ('Quáº£n trá»‹ kinh doanh'), ('Ká»¹ thuáº­t Ã´ tÃ´'), ('NgÃ´n ngá»¯ Anh');

CREATE TABLE users (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  role VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'user'
);

CREATE TABLE hoso (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ten VARCHAR(255),
  nganh_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (nganh_id) REFERENCES nganh(id)
);
```

## **BÆ¯á»šC 2: Káº¾T Ná»I REACT Vá»šI BACKEND**

### 2.1. Láº¥y danh sÃ¡ch ngÃ nh trong form Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½
Trong `DangKyXetTuyen.jsx`:
```jsx
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import axios from "axios";

function DangKyXetTuyen() {
  const [nganhList, setNganhList] = useState([]);

  useEffect(() => {
    axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/nganh")
      .then(res => setNganhList(res.data))
      .catch(err => console.error(err));
  }, []);

  // ...trong <select> ngÃ nh:
  // <select>
  //   {nganhList.map(nganh => (
  //     <option key={nganh.id} value={nganh.id}>{nganh.ten_nganh}</option>
  //   ))}
  // </select>
}
```

### 2.2. ÄÄƒng nháº­p vÃ  phÃ¢n quyá»n
- Khi Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p thÃ nh cÃ´ng, lÆ°u token vÃ  role vÃ o localStorage/context.
- Khi gá»i API cáº§n xÃ¡c thá»±c, gá»­i header:  
  ```js
  axios.get('/api/admin/hoso', { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` } })
  ```
- áº¨n/hiá»‡n menu, trang theo role.

## **BÆ¯á»šC 3: HIá»‚N THá»Š GIAO DIá»†N THEO PHÃ‚N QUYá»€N**

- Náº¿u role lÃ  `admin`: Hiá»‡n trang quáº£n lÃ½, duyá»‡t há»“ sÆ¡, v.v.
- Náº¿u role lÃ  `user`: Chá»‰ hiá»‡n Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½, tra cá»©u, v.v.

- Backend Node.js/Express káº¿t ná»‘i SQL, cung cáº¥p API.
- React gá»i API láº¥y ngÃ nh, Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p, phÃ¢n quyá»n.
- Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ giao diá»‡n phÃ¹ há»£p vá»›i tá»«ng loáº¡i tÃ i khoáº£n.

**Báº¡n muá»‘n mÃ¬nh hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n chi tiáº¿t pháº§n nÃ o trÆ°á»›c?**
- Táº¡o backend Node.js/Express?
- Káº¿t ná»‘i React láº¥y ngÃ nh há»c?
- ÄÄƒng nháº­p vÃ  phÃ¢n quyá»n?
- Hay táº¥t cáº£ tá»«ng bÆ°á»›c má»™t?

Báº¡n hÃ£y chá»n, mÃ¬nh sáº½ hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n chi tiáº¿t tá»«ng pháº§n!

## 1. Káº¿t ná»‘i SQL Server báº±ng Windows Authentication

Vá»›i thÆ° viá»‡n `mssql`, báº¡n chá»‰ cáº§n bá» `user` vÃ  `password`, thÃªm `options: { trustedConnection: true }` hoáº·c `authentication: { type: 'ntlm', options: { ... } }`. Tuy nhiÃªn, cÃ¡ch Ä‘Æ¡n giáº£n nháº¥t lÃ :

```js
      userName: '', // Äá»ƒ trá»‘ng Ä‘á»ƒ dÃ¹ng tÃ i khoáº£n Windows hiá»‡n táº¡i
      password: '', // Äá»ƒ trá»‘ng Ä‘á»ƒ dÃ¹ng tÃ i khoáº£n Windows hiá»‡n táº¡i
```

**Hoáº·c Ä‘Æ¡n giáº£n hÆ¡n:**

### 1. **CÃ¡ch thiáº¿t káº¿ cÆ¡ sá»Ÿ dá»¯ liá»‡u**

> **KhuyÃªn dÃ¹ng cÃ¡ch 2** vÃ¬:

- Náº¿u dÃ¹ng SQL Authentication, hÃ£y thá»­ táº¡o user/password vÃ  dÃ¹ng Ä‘á»ƒ test.

### 6. **Kiá»ƒm tra SQL Server cho phÃ©p káº¿t ná»‘i remote**

  - **Password:** Ä‘áº·t máº­t kháº©u
  - **Authentication:** chá»n SQL Server authentication
  - **User Mapping:** tick vÃ o database `tuyensinh`, chá»n role `db_owner`
  - OK

### 2. **Cáº¥u hÃ¬nh láº¡i file backend/index.js**

```js

  user: 'sa', // hoáº·c user báº¡n vá»«a táº¡o
  password: 'your_password', // máº­t kháº©u báº¡n Ä‘áº·t
  server: 'localhost', // hoáº·c 'DESKTOP-8S6DUP6'
```


### 1. **Cáº­p nháº­t láº¡i cáº¥u hÃ¬nh káº¿t ná»‘i trong backend/index.js**

### 1. **Náº¿u báº¡n muá»‘n dÃ¹ng Windows Authentication:**

- **Chá»‰ dÃ¹ng 1 trong 2 cÃ¡ch trÃªn, khÃ´ng trá»™n láº«n!**

## 1. **CÃ i Ä‘áº·t MySQL vÃ  thÆ° viá»‡n káº¿t ná»‘i**

```js
    if (err) return res.status(500).json({ error: err });
    res.json(results);
  });

```

## 4. **Táº¡o láº¡i database vÃ  cÃ¡c báº£ng trong MySQL**

**Cháº¡y cÃ¡c lá»‡nh sau trong MySQL Workbench hoáº·c terminal:**
```sql

USE tuyensinh;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS nganh (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ten_nganh VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  ma_nganh VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

-- ThÃªm dá»¯ liá»‡u ngÃ nh (copy Ä‘oáº¡n insert tá»« cÃ¡c hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n trÆ°á»›c)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  role VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'user'
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hoso (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ten VARCHAR(255),
  nganh_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (nganh_id) REFERENCES nganh(id)
);
```
**Sau Ä‘Ã³ thÃªm dá»¯ liá»‡u ngÃ nh nhÆ° hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n trÆ°á»›c.**

- Thay cÃ¡c truy váº¥n SQL Server báº±ng truy váº¥n MySQL (cÃº phÃ¡p gáº§n nhÆ° giá»‘ng nhau).

## 1. **Äá» xuáº¥t cáº¥u trÃºc báº£ng `hoso` Ä‘áº§y Ä‘á»§ cho ÄÄƒng kÃ½ xÃ©t tuyá»ƒn**

Dá»±a trÃªn form Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½, báº£ng `hoso` nÃªn cÃ³ cÃ¡c trÆ°á»ng sau:

| TÃªn cá»™t           | Kiá»ƒu dá»¯ liá»‡u      | Ã nghÄ©a                                  |
|-------------------|------------------|------------------------------------------|
| id                | INT, PK, AI      | KhÃ³a chÃ­nh tá»± tÄƒng                      |
| ho_ten            | VARCHAR(255)     | Há» vÃ  tÃªn thÃ­ sinh                      |
| ngay_sinh         | DATE             | NgÃ y sinh                               |
| cccd              | VARCHAR(20)      | Sá»‘ CCCD                                 |
| sdt               | VARCHAR(20)      | Sá»‘ Ä‘iá»‡n thoáº¡i                           |
| email             | VARCHAR(255)     | Email                                   |
| noi_hoc_12        | VARCHAR(255)     | NÆ¡i há»c lá»›p 12                          |
| truong_thpt       | VARCHAR(255)     | TrÆ°á»ng THPT                             |
| ten_lop_12        | VARCHAR(50)      | TÃªn lá»›p 12                              |
| dia_chi           | VARCHAR(255)     | Äá»‹a chá»‰ nháº­n giáº¥y bÃ¡o                   |
| nganh_id          | INT              | MÃ£ ngÃ nh (liÃªn káº¿t báº£ng nganh)          |
| diem_hk1          | TEXT             | Äiá»ƒm HK1 (cÃ³ thá»ƒ lÆ°u JSON hoáº·c chuá»—i)   |
| diem_ca_nam       | TEXT             | Äiá»ƒm cáº£ nÄƒm (cÃ³ thá»ƒ lÆ°u JSON hoáº·c chuá»—i)|
| file_ho_so        | VARCHAR(255)     | ÄÆ°á»ng dáº«n file upload                   |
| ngay_dang_ky      | DATETIME         | NgÃ y Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½                            |

Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ thÃªm cÃ¡c trÆ°á»ng khÃ¡c náº¿u cáº§n.

---

## 2. **Lá»‡nh SQL cáº­p nháº­t báº£ng `hoso`**

```sql
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS hoso;
CREATE TABLE hoso (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ho_ten VARCHAR(255),
  ngay_sinh DATE,
  cccd VARCHAR(20),
  sdt VARCHAR(20),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  noi_hoc_12 VARCHAR(255),
  truong_thpt VARCHAR(255),
  ten_lop_12 VARCHAR(50),
  dia_chi VARCHAR(255),
  nganh_id INT,
  diem_hk1 TEXT,
  diem_ca_nam TEXT,
  file_ho_so VARCHAR(255),
  ngay_dang_ky DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (nganh_id) REFERENCES nganh(id)
);
```
> Náº¿u báº¡n cho phÃ©p Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½ nhiá»u ngÃ nh/nguyá»‡n vá»ng, cÃ³ thá»ƒ táº¡o báº£ng phá»¥ hoáº·c lÆ°u nhiá»u id ngÃ nh trong má»™t trÆ°á»ng (dáº¡ng JSON hoáº·c chuá»—i, hoáº·c táº¡o báº£ng `hoso_nganh`).

---

## 3. **Cáº­p nháº­t UI vÃ  API ÄÄƒng kÃ½ xÃ©t tuyá»ƒn**

### **A. UI (React)**
- Form nháº­p Ä‘áº§y Ä‘á»§ cÃ¡c trÆ°á»ng trÃªn.
- Upload file: dÃ¹ng input type="file", gá»­i file qua FormData.
- Khi báº¥m "HoÃ n táº¥t Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½", gá»­i dá»¯ liá»‡u lÃªn API `/api/hoso` (POST), bao gá»“m cáº£ file.

### **B. Backend (Node.js + Express + MySQL)**
- Sá»­ dá»¥ng `multer` Ä‘á»ƒ nháº­n file upload.
- LÆ°u thÃ´ng tin vÃ o báº£ng `hoso`, bao gá»“m Ä‘Æ°á»ng dáº«n file.

---

## 4. **VÃ­ dá»¥ API backend nháº­n Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½ vÃ  upload file**

**CÃ i Ä‘áº·t thÃªm multer:**
```bash
npm install multer
```

**VÃ­ dá»¥ code backend:**
```js
const multer = require('multer');
const upload = multer({ dest: 'uploads/' }); // ThÆ° má»¥c lÆ°u file

app.post('/api/hoso', upload.single('file_ho_so'), (req, res) => {
  const {
    ho_ten, ngay_sinh, cccd, sdt, email, noi_hoc_12, truong_thpt, ten_lop_12, dia_chi, nganh_id, diem_hk1, diem_ca_nam
  } = req.body;
  const file_ho_so = req.file ? req.file.filename : null;

  db.query(
    `INSERT INTO hoso (ho_ten, ngay_sinh, cccd, sdt, email, noi_hoc_12, truong_thpt, ten_lop_12, dia_chi, nganh_id, diem_hk1, diem_ca_nam, file_ho_so)
     VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)`,
    [ho_ten, ngay_sinh, cccd, sdt, email, noi_hoc_12, truong_thpt, ten_lop_12, dia_chi, nganh_id, diem_hk1, diem_ca_nam, file_ho_so],
    (err, result) => {
      if (err) return res.status(500).json({ error: err });
      res.json({ message: 'ÄÄƒng kÃ½ thÃ nh cÃ´ng!' });
    }
  );
});
```

---

## 5. **Cáº­p nháº­t UI React (vÃ­ dá»¥ gá»­i FormData)**

```jsx
const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
  e.preventDefault();
  const formData = new FormData();
  formData.append('ho_ten', hoTen);
  formData.append('ngay_sinh', ngaySinh);
  // ... cÃ¡c trÆ°á»ng khÃ¡c
  formData.append('file_ho_so', fileHoSo); // fileHoSo lÃ  file object

  await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/hoso', formData, {
    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data' }
  });
};
```

## 6. **UI hiá»‡n Ä‘áº¡i, hiá»‡u á»©ng mÆ°á»£t mÃ **

- `nganh_ids`: LÆ°u máº£ng id ngÃ nh (JSON.stringify).
- `diem_hk1`, `diem_ca_nam`: LÆ°u object Ä‘iá»ƒm cÃ¡c mÃ´n (JSON.stringify).

## 1. **Cáº­p nháº­t báº£ng `hoso` trong MySQL**

Cháº¡y lá»‡nh sau trong MySQL Workbench hoáº·c terminal Ä‘á»ƒ thÃªm trÆ°á»ng `nganh_ids` (lÆ°u nhiá»u ngÃ nh), Ä‘áº£m báº£o `diem_hk1`, `diem_ca_nam` lÃ  TEXT:

## 2. **Cáº­p nháº­t backend Node.js (Express + MySQL)**

```js

  [ho_ten, ngay_sinh, cccd, sdt, email, noi_hoc_12, truong_thpt, ten_lop_12, dia_chi, nganh_id, nganh_ids, diem_hk1, diem_ca_nam, file_ho_so],
```

- `nganh_ids`, `diem_hk1`, `diem_ca_nam` Ä‘á»u lÃ  chuá»—i JSON.stringify tá»« frontend.

## 3. **Cáº­p nháº­t UI React**

### **A. TrÆ°á»ng THPT:**

```jsx

  onChange={e => setTruongThpt(e.target.value)}
```

### **B. Chá»n nhiá»u ngÃ nh:**


### **C. Äiá»ƒm cÃ¡c mÃ´n:**
- LÆ°u object `{toan: 8, van: 7, ...}` cho tá»«ng há»c ká»³.
- Khi submit:
  ```js

  formData.append('diem_ca_nam', JSON.stringify(diemCaNamObj));
  ```

### **D. Upload áº£nh:**
- Khi chá»n file, hiá»ƒn thá»‹ preview:
  ```jsx

    <img src={URL.createObjectURL(fileHoSo)} alt="Preview" className="mt-2 rounded shadow w-32" />
  )}
  ```

### **E. Gá»­i FormData**
```js
const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
```

- Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ progress khi upload file (náº¿u muá»‘n).

- **Chá»‰ cáº§n thÃªm trÆ°á»ng `nganh_ids` kiá»ƒu TEXT** Ä‘á»ƒ lÆ°u nhiá»u ngÃ nh.

Sau Ä‘Ã³ cháº¡y láº¡i dá»± Ã¡n, báº¡n sáº½ tháº¥y giao diá»‡n vÃ  hiá»‡u á»©ng UI/UX hoÃ n toÃ n má»›i, chuyÃªn nghiá»‡p vÃ  hiá»‡n Ä‘áº¡i hÆ¡n ráº¥t nhiá»u!

---

## 1. **CÆ¡ sá»Ÿ dá»¯ liá»‡u (MySQL)**
Báº¡n Ä‘Ã£ cÃ³ báº£ng `users` vá»›i cá»™t `role` (`user` hoáº·c `admin`). Náº¿u chÆ°a, hÃ£y Ä‘áº£m báº£o báº£ng nhÆ° sau:

```sql
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  role VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'user'
);
```

---

## 2. **Backend Node.js (Express + MySQL + JWT + bcryptjs)**

### **A. ÄÄƒng kÃ½ tÃ i khoáº£n**
- API: `POST /api/register`
- Nháº­n: `username`, `password`, `role` (máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  `user`)
- MÃ£ hÃ³a máº­t kháº©u báº±ng `bcryptjs`

### **B. ÄÄƒng nháº­p**
- API: `POST /api/login`
- Nháº­n: `username`, `password`
- So sÃ¡nh máº­t kháº©u, tráº£ vá» JWT token vÃ  role

### **C. Middleware xÃ¡c thá»±c vÃ  phÃ¢n quyá»n**
- Kiá»ƒm tra JWT token, láº¥y role tá»« token
- Cháº·n truy cáº­p náº¿u khÃ´ng Ä‘á»§ quyá»n

---

### **VÃ­ dá»¥ code backend:**

```js
const bcrypt = require('bcryptjs');
const jwt = require('jsonwebtoken');

// ÄÄƒng kÃ½ tÃ i khoáº£n
app.post('/api/register', async (req, res) => {
  const { username, password, role } = req.body;
  const hash = await bcrypt.hash(password, 10);
  db.query(
    'INSERT INTO users (username, password, role) VALUES (?, ?, ?)',
    [username, hash, role || 'user'],
    (err) => {
      if (err) return res.status(500).json({ error: err });
      res.json({ message: 'ÄÄƒng kÃ½ thÃ nh cÃ´ng' });
    }
  );
});

// ÄÄƒng nháº­p
app.post('/api/login', (req, res) => {
  const { username, password } = req.body;
  db.query('SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = ?', [username], async (err, results) => {
    if (err || results.length === 0) return res.status(401).json({ error: 'Sai tÃ i khoáº£n hoáº·c máº­t kháº©u' });
    const user = results[0];
    const match = await bcrypt.compare(password, user.password);
    if (!match) return res.status(401).json({ error: 'Sai tÃ i khoáº£n hoáº·c máº­t kháº©u' });
    const token = jwt.sign({ id: user.id, role: user.role }, 'secret_key', { expiresIn: '1d' });
    res.json({ token, role: user.role });
  });
});

// Middleware xÃ¡c thá»±c
function auth(role = 'user') {
  return (req, res, next) => {
    const token = req.headers.authorization?.split(' ')[1];
    if (!token) return res.status(401).json({ error: 'ChÆ°a Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p' });
    jwt.verify(token, 'secret_key', (err, decoded) => {
      if (err) return res.status(403).json({ error: 'Token khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡' });
      if (role === 'admin' && decoded.role !== 'admin') return res.status(403).json({ error: 'KhÃ´ng Ä‘á»§ quyá»n' });
      req.user = decoded;
      next();
    });
  };
}
```

## 3. **Frontend React**

### **A. Táº¡o trang ÄÄƒng kÃ½ (`DangKyTaiKhoan.jsx`)**
- Form nháº­p: username, password, xÃ¡c nháº­n password, chá»n vai trÃ² (user/admin)
- Gá»­i POST `/api/register`

### **B. Táº¡o trang ÄÄƒng nháº­p (`DangNhap.jsx`)**
- Form nháº­p: username, password
- Gá»­i POST `/api/login`
- LÆ°u token vÃ  role vÃ o localStorage/context

### **C. PhÃ¢n quyá»n giao diá»‡n**
- Náº¿u role lÃ  `admin`: Hiá»‡n cÃ¡c trang quáº£n lÃ½, duyá»‡t há»“ sÆ¡, v.v.
- Náº¿u role lÃ  `user`: Chá»‰ hiá»‡n Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½, tra cá»©u, v.v.
- Khi gá»i API cáº§n xÃ¡c thá»±c, gá»­i header:  
  ```js
  axios.get('/api/admin/hoso', { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` } })
  ```

- Sá»­ dá»¥ng TailwindCSS, framer-motion cho form Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p/Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½.
- ThÃ´ng bÃ¡o lá»—i/thÃ nh cÃ´ng dáº¡ng toast hoáº·c alert Ä‘á»™ng.

## 5. **Báº¡n muá»‘n mÃ¬nh táº¡o file máº«u cho tá»«ng trang (ÄÄƒng nháº­p, ÄÄƒng kÃ½) vÃ  cáº­p nháº­t backend khÃ´ng?**
- Náº¿u muá»‘n, hÃ£y xÃ¡c nháº­n, mÃ¬nh sáº½ tá»± Ä‘á»™ng táº¡o code cho báº¡n!

---

_**User**_

Báº¡n hÃ£y cáº­p nháº­t code cho tÃ´i, tÃ´i muá»‘n nhá»¯ng trang nÃ y cÃ³ thiáº¿t káº¿ UI hiá»‡n Ä‘áº¡i, animation hiá»‡n Ä‘áº¡i káº¿t há»£p cá»§a tailwindcss + react + vite

---

_**Assistant**_

Tuyá»‡t vá»i! MÃ¬nh sáº½ cáº­p nháº­t cho báº¡n:
- **Trang ÄÄƒng kÃ½ tÃ i khoáº£n** (cho user vÃ  admin)
- **Trang ÄÄƒng nháº­p**
- **UI hiá»‡n Ä‘áº¡i, animation mÆ°á»£t mÃ  vá»›i TailwindCSS + framer-motion**
- **TÃ­ch há»£p backend nhÆ° Ä‘Ã£ hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n**

## 1. **Táº¡o file ÄÄƒng kÃ½ tÃ i khoáº£n: `DangKyTaiKhoan.jsx`**

```jsx
import React, { useState } from "react";
import axios from "axios";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";

function DangKyTaiKhoan() {
  const [form, setForm] = useState({ username: "", password: "", confirm: "", role: "user" });
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [success, setSuccess] = useState("");
  const [error, setError] = useState("");

  const handleChange = e => setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value });

  const handleSubmit = async e => {
    e.preventDefault();
    setSuccess(""); setError(""); setLoading(true);
    if (form.password !== form.confirm) {
      setError("Máº­t kháº©u xÃ¡c nháº­n khÃ´ng khá»›p!"); setLoading(false); return;
    }
    try {
      await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/register", {
        username: form.username,
        password: form.password,
        role: form.role
      });
      setSuccess("ÄÄƒng kÃ½ thÃ nh cÃ´ng!"); setForm({ username: "", password: "", confirm: "", role: "user" });
    } catch (err) {
      setError("ÄÄƒng kÃ½ tháº¥t báº¡i! TÃ i khoáº£n Ä‘Ã£ tá»“n táº¡i?");
    } finally { setLoading(false); }
  };

  return (
    <motion.div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-100 to-yellow-100"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }} animate={{ opacity: 1 }}>
      <motion.form
        className="bg-white p-8 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl w-full max-w-md space-y-6"
        initial={{ y: 40, opacity: 0 }} animate={{ y: 0, opacity: 1 }} transition={{ duration: 0.7, type: "spring" }}
        onSubmit={handleSubmit}
      >
        <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-800 text-center mb-2">ÄÄƒng kÃ½ tÃ i khoáº£n</h2>
        <div className="space-y-4">
          <div>
            <label className="block font-medium mb-1">TÃªn Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p</label>
            <input name="username" value={form.username} onChange={handleChange} required
              className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-b-2 border-gray-300 focus:border-blue-600 outline-none transition bg-transparent" />
          </div>
          <div>
            <label className="block font-medium mb-1">Máº­t kháº©u</label>
            <input name="password" type="password" value={form.password} onChange={handleChange} required
              className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-b-2 border-gray-300 focus:border-blue-600 outline-none transition bg-transparent" />
          </div>
          <div>
            <label className="block font-medium mb-1">XÃ¡c nháº­n máº­t kháº©u</label>
            <input name="confirm" type="password" value={form.confirm} onChange={handleChange} required
              className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-b-2 border-gray-300 focus:border-blue-600 outline-none transition bg-transparent" />
          </div>
          <div>
            <label className="block font-medium mb-1">Vai trÃ²</label>
            <select name="role" value={form.role} onChange={handleChange}
              className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-b-2 border-gray-300 focus:border-blue-600 outline-none transition bg-transparent">
              <option value="user">NgÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng</option>
              <option value="admin">Quáº£n lÃ½</option>
            </select>
          </div>
        </div>
        <button type="submit" disabled={loading}
          className="w-full py-2 mt-4 bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-blue-400 hover:from-blue-700 hover:to-blue-500 text-white font-bold rounded-full shadow-lg transition-all duration-200 text-lg flex items-center justify-center gap-2">
          {loading && <span className="loader border-white border-t-blue-600 animate-spin rounded-full w-5 h-5 border-2"></span>}
          ÄÄƒng kÃ½
        </button>
        {success && <motion.div className="mt-2 p-2 bg-green-100 text-green-700 rounded text-center" initial={{ opacity: 0 }} animate={{ opacity: 1 }}>{success}</motion.div>}
        {error && <motion.div className="mt-2 p-2 bg-red-100 text-red-700 rounded text-center" initial={{ opacity: 0 }} animate={{ opacity: 1 }}>{error}</motion.div>}
      </motion.form>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default DangKyTaiKhoan;
```

---

## 2. **Táº¡o file ÄÄƒng nháº­p: `DangNhap.jsx`**

```jsx
import React, { useState } from "react";
import axios from "axios";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";
import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom";

function DangNhap() {
  const [form, setForm] = useState({ username: "", password: "" });
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState("");
  const navigate = useNavigate();

  const handleChange = e => setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value });

  const handleSubmit = async e => {
    e.preventDefault();
    setError(""); setLoading(true);
    try {
      const res = await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/login", form);
      localStorage.setItem("token", res.data.token);
      localStorage.setItem("role", res.data.role);
      // Äiá»u hÆ°á»›ng theo quyá»n
      if (res.data.role === "admin") navigate("/admin");
      else navigate("/");
    } catch (err) {
      setError("ÄÄƒng nháº­p tháº¥t báº¡i! Sai tÃ i khoáº£n hoáº·c máº­t kháº©u.");
    } finally { setLoading(false); }
  };

  return (
    <motion.div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-100 to-yellow-100"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }} animate={{ opacity: 1 }}>
      <motion.form
        className="bg-white p-8 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl w-full max-w-md space-y-6"
        initial={{ y: 40, opacity: 0 }} animate={{ y: 0, opacity: 1 }} transition={{ duration: 0.7, type: "spring" }}
        onSubmit={handleSubmit}
      >
        <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-800 text-center mb-2">ÄÄƒng nháº­p</h2>
        <div className="space-y-4">
          <div>
            <label className="block font-medium mb-1">TÃªn Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p</label>
            <input name="username" value={form.username} onChange={handleChange} required
              className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-b-2 border-gray-300 focus:border-blue-600 outline-none transition bg-transparent" />
          </div>
          <div>
            <label className="block font-medium mb-1">Máº­t kháº©u</label>
            <input name="password" type="password" value={form.password} onChange={handleChange} required
              className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-b-2 border-gray-300 focus:border-blue-600 outline-none transition bg-transparent" />
          </div>
        </div>
        <button type="submit" disabled={loading}
          className="w-full py-2 mt-4 bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-blue-400 hover:from-blue-700 hover:to-blue-500 text-white font-bold rounded-full shadow-lg transition-all duration-200 text-lg flex items-center justify-center gap-2">
          {loading && <span className="loader border-white border-t-blue-600 animate-spin rounded-full w-5 h-5 border-2"></span>}
          ÄÄƒng nháº­p
        </button>
        {error && <motion.div className="mt-2 p-2 bg-red-100 text-red-700 rounded text-center" initial={{ opacity: 0 }} animate={{ opacity: 1 }}>{error}</motion.div>}
      </motion.form>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default DangNhap;
```

```diff
+ import React, { useState } from "react";
+ import axios from "axios";
+ import { motion } from "framer-motion";
+ import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom";
+ 
+ function DangNhap() {
+   const [form, setForm] = useState({ username: "", password: "" });
+   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
+   const [error, setError] = useState("");
+   const navigate = useNavigate();
+ 
+   const handleChange = e => setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value });
+ 
+   const handleSubmit = async e => {
+     e.preventDefault();
+     setError(""); setLoading(true);
+     try {
+       const res = await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/login", form);
+       localStorage.setItem("token", res.data.token);
+       localStorage.setItem("role", res.data.role);
+       if (res.data.role === "admin") navigate("/admin");
+       else navigate("/");
+     } catch (err) {
+       setError("ÄÄƒng nháº­p tháº¥t báº¡i! Sai tÃ i khoáº£n hoáº·c máº­t kháº©u.");
+     } finally { setLoading(false); }
+   };
+ 
+   return (

+       initial={{ opacity: 0 }} animate={{ opacity: 1 }}>
+       <motion.form
+         className="bg-white p-8 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl w-full max-w-md space-y-6"
+         initial={{ y: 40, opacity: 0 }} animate={{ y: 0, opacity: 1 }} transition={{ duration: 0.7, type: "spring" }}
+         onSubmit={handleSubmit}
+       >
+         <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-800 text-center mb-2">ÄÄƒng nháº­p</h2>
+         <div className="space-y-4">
+           <div>
+             <label className="block font-medium mb-1">TÃªn Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p</label>
+             <input name="username" value={form.username} onChange={handleChange} required

+           </div>
```
